javadoc.text: * Interface for a sequence of points.
* Returns the number of points in the sequence.
javadoc.return: number of points in the sequence

javadoc.text: * Returns the x component of the point at the given index.
* Returns the y component of the point at the given index.
* Returns a point representation of the coordinates at the given index.
javadoc.param: dst output parameter into which the point's details will be * populated, if null a new one will be created.
javadoc.return: a point representation of the coordinates at the given index

javadoc.text: * Returns the bounds of all the points taken as a whole.
javadoc.param: dst output parameter to store bounds into, if null a new rectangle * will be created
